medical_history.chief_complaint: 18 hours history of epigastric and periumbilical pain migrating to right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 18 hours prior to presentation, starting as epigastric and periumbilical pain that migrated to the right lower quadrant. Patient endorses fever, chills, nausea, and vomiting. Reports last bowel movement was hard and spurred some blood on toilet paper. Denies diarrhea and last flatus was yesterday.
medical_history.family_history: No known history of IBD or GI cancers. Aunt passed away from pancreatic cancer. Both grandmothers passed away from lung cancer. Paternal aunt with lung cancer.
